text:
"Nice to meet you everyone."
──... Hmm, a bit stiff, isn't it...?

"Nice to meet you everyone!"
No, that sounded too forced...

Just because it's a puppet doesn't mean
you have to use a high-pitched voice...

It should sound more approachable...
Hmm, "Nice to meet you"──

! Ugh,
I was starting to get it right for once!

Ahh, the task...! I need to reply to that...!
Let me practice a bit more~~!
